Hi.  I suppose you want to know how to get started?  OK.  Introduce your 
character in any way you know how, and then come to the door of a base and, 
well join a faction!  Then you can get to know other RPers, and get in 
missions and battles.  This is brief, but i'm sure you'll figure it out :)
